name: cmypitch
overview:
cmypitch.com is a social network for small business, connecting entrepreneurs with investors and service providers.

The video-based website has five distinct business communities for anyone starting, running, growing or selling a business. With a directory of 70,000 service providers to small and growing businesses, as well as a dedicated “Entrepreneur TV” channel featuring exclusive interviews with hugely successful business leaders, cmypitch.com provides a platform to help entrepreneurs succeed.

It has three main groups of users: 1. business owners; 2. investors; and 3. business service providers. Through video, businesses can present their ideas and companies with real impact. Investors can get an instant feel for the people behind an idea or a company. Service providers can differentiate their services to a targeted group.

It is the first site in the UK to use video as a platform to connect entrepreneurs seeking funding for their business with investors.

It provides a niche business directory with 70,000 suppliers for business owners. Each supplier can upgrade their listing to a cmypitch premium listing and market themselves to the targeted cmypitch community.

Through â€˜Entrepreneur TVâ€™ cmypitch.com interviews and showcases the most successful entrepreneurs in their fields.

The dynamic user-generated information centre, seeded by cmypitch.com and further populated by directory members, provides fantastic insights and relevant information about the business and entrepreneurial world.
